footer.description: Revolutionizing Minecraft gameplay with intelligent AI agents.

item_1.label: What are Cognicraft agents?
item_1.message: Cognicraft agents are AI-powered characters designed to enhance your Minecraft experience. They automate tasks such as building, mining, farming, and collecting.

item_2.label: What types of agents are available?
item_2.message: Available agents: Architect Agent (building), Adventurer Agent (mining and exploration), Collector Agent (inventory management and automatic collection).

item_3.label: Are the agents safe?
item_3.message: Yes! All our agents are designed to be 100% safe. They do not pose a risk of server violations or bans.

item_4.label: Which platforms do they work on?
item_4.message: Cognicraft agents are optimized to work on Minecraft Java and Bedrock editions.

item_5.label: How can I purchase agents?
item_5.message: You can select the agent you want on our website using the 'Buy Now' button and complete your purchase with secure payment methods.

item_6.label: Can I get support?
item_6.message: Yes! Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you. You can reach out to us via our contact page for any questions.
